tool.name: cpptraj_convert
tool.description: : Converts between cpptraj compatible trajectory file formats and/or extracts a selection of atoms or frames.

param.name: input_top_path
param.label: input TOP,PDB,PRMTOP,PARMTOP,ZIP file
param.help: Path to the input structure or topology file. Format: [input].top

param.help: Path to the input trajectory to be processed. Format: [input].crd

param.name: outname_output_cpptraj_path
param.label: output CRD,NETCDF,RST7,NCRST,DCD,PDB,MOL2,BINPOS,TRR,XTC,SQM name
param.help: Path to the output processed trajectory Format: [output].crd
